Featured.name: Jacket
Featured.des: The Gildan Ultra Cotton T-shirt is made from a substantial 6.0 oz. per sq. yd. fabric constructed from 100% cotton, this classic fit preshrunk jersey knit provides unmatched comfort with each wear. Featuring a taped neck and shoulder and a seamless double- needle collar, and available in a range of colors, it offers it all in the ultimate head-turning package.
